text.survivality.config.title: Survivality Config
text.survivality.config.option.safeCactu: Cactus blocks don't destroy Cactus items
text.survivality.config.option.featheryF: Feather Falling boots don't trample farmland
text.survivality.config.option.unstableD: Pointed Dripstone falls when hit by strong projectiles
text.survivality.config.option.betterNig: Night Vision is affected by its amplifier
text.survivality.config.option.maxNightV: Max amount Night Vision can affect brightness
text.survivality.config.option.tridentDr: Drop rate of Tridents from Drowned
text.survivality.config.option.eyeOfEnde: Chance for Eyes of Enders to break
text.survivality.config.option.zombieHor: Horses struck by lightning become Zombie Horses
text.survivality.config.option.playerXpM: Amount of xp to drop on death
text.survivality.config.option.colorfulS: Sheep can rarely spawn with any color wool
text.survivality.config.option.maxSlimeS: Max size a Slime can spawn as
text.survivality.config.option.maxMagmaC: Max size a Magma Cube can spawn as
text.survivality.config.option.moreSnack: Cookies, Sweet Berries, and Glow Berries are eaten faster
text.survivality.config.option.shovelabl: Snow Layers can be decreased with Shovels
text.survivality.config.option.variantSp: Dungeon spawners are affected by the biome they generate in
text.survivality.config.option.randomWor: Freshly generated worlds can start at any time
Freshly generated worlds can start with any weather
Freshly generated worlds can start with a random position
Freshly generated worlds can start in any biome
text.survivality.config.option.rocketBoo: Rockets boost vehicles and ridden mobs
text.survivality.config.option.allowRock: Vehicles can be boosted on land
text.survivality.config.option.spawnerRe: Default range for players to activate spawners
text.survivality.config.option.unrestric: Spawners will spawn regardless of how many mobs are nearby
text.survivality.config.option.polarBear: Chance for Polar Bears to spawn with a Stray on their back
text.survivality.config.option.boatsIgno: Boats do not collide with Lily Pads, but they still break them
text.survivality.config.option.cactusGro: Max height for Cactus to grow
text.survivality.config.option.sugarCane: Max height for Sugar Cane to grow
text.survivality.config.option.fertiliza: Convert Dirt into Grass via Bone Meal
text.survivality.config.option.tntFuelEx: Chance for Tnt to explode a Furnace when cooking
text.survivality.config.option.snowFog.@: Display fog when snowing in mountain biomes
